price: 你的养主，必依照他的决定在他们之间进行裁判。他确是万能的，确是全知的。
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥuk'mihi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
